speaker: Doctor
text: Hi, how have you been feeling on your current medications, especially the lithium and gabapentin?

speaker: Patient
text: I've been okay, but I sometimes feel a bit shaky. I'm not sure if it's the lithium or something else.

speaker: Doctor
text: Shakiness can be a side effect of lithium. When was your last lithium level check?

speaker: Patient
text: I think it was about a month ago. They said it was within the normal range.

speaker: Doctor
text: Alright, we should probably check it again soon to make sure it's still stable. How's the gabapentin working for your back pain?

speaker: Patient
text: It helps a bit, but the pain is still there. I was wondering if we could adjust the dose or try something else.
